price: 有一个人从城中最远的地方跑来说：“我的宗族呀！你们应当顺从使者们，
arabic: وَجَآءَ مِنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٞ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُواْ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wajāa min aqṣā al-madīnati rajulun yasʿā qāla yāqawmi ittabiʿū al-mur'salīna
